author: nc1234
content: fyi `tx_spammer` in kurtosis config is renamed to `tx_fuzz` in the latest release as per https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/pull/923

author: nc1234
content: <@358120958726373381> do you have a kurtosis config I can run for Lighthouse-only? I am having trouble getting Dora to recognize LH's block for some reason

author: nc1234
content:
Issue is I called `engine_getInclusionListV1` right after `engine_forkchoiceUpdatedV3` and geth wasn't ready and returned empty IL to me. Waited for 4s like Prysm does and Geth returned non-empty IL
> DEBUG[03-20|02:59:46.134] Served engine_newPayloadV5               conn=172.16.0.14:60930 reqid=58 duration=29.160042ms

> DEBUG[03-20|02:59:46.194] Served engine_getInclusionListV1         conn=172.16.0.14:60930 reqid=60 duration="403.291µs"

author: jih2nn
content: Awesome, great work! I'll get back to you when I'm done rebasing Prysm onto Electra. I think we can work on interop afterward.
